parameter.name: date
parameter.documentation: Limit the search to this date. Can specify upper or lower limits and periods by providing an upper and a lower limit.

parameter.name: _count
parameter.documentation: Limit the result bundle to this many entries. To get more entries request the next page.

parameter.name: _offset
parameter.documentation: Defines the offset of the first entry in the collection.

parameter.name: return
parameter.documentation: Searchset bundle containing the requested entities.
